input.sentences: the day spent on the beach was amazing .
the kids all had fun on the edge of the water .
they even learned how to fish .
some of them even caught fish | though they were small .
at the end of the day | everyone had fun .
output.sentences: Today I spent my day at the beach.
The kids had fun in the water.
They even learned how to fish.
I was proud of the fish they caught,
Over all it was a fun day.
